about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, AA Plus Tradelink Limited is engaged in the trading of products made of iron & steel, aluminium, graphite, and other alloy products. It offers a diversified range of products such as aluminium bars, Aluminium Scrap, Aluminium Powder, G I pipes, Graphite Flakes, Graphite Powder, Graphite Rods, Blocks and Plates, Graphite Square and Round, M S Pipe, M S Sheet, Nickel Powder, Zirconium Alloy, etc to clients in construction and manufacturing sector.

It further supplies Epoxy Floor coatings, PU Floor Coating, Epoxy Primer, and Epoxy Heat Resistance Coating.

Competitive strengths

  • Diversified product portfolio.
  • High-quality products.

faqs.question: What is the AA Plus Tradelink IPO?
faqs.answer:
AA Plus Tradelink IPO is a SME IPO of 3600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.48 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹18 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on July 8, 2021, and closes on July 13, 2021.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in AA Plus Tradelink IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in AA Plus Tradelink IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in AA Plus Tradelink IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in AA Plus Tradelink IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'AA Plus Tradelink IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When AA Plus Tradelink IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The AA Plus Tradelink IPO opens on July 8, 2021 and closes on July 13, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of AA Plus Tradelink IPO?
faqs.answer: AA Plus Tradelink IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for AA Plus Tradelink IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in AA Plus Tradelink IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is AA Plus Tradelink IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for AA Plus Tradelink IPO will be done on Friday, July 16, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, July 19, 2021. Check the AA Plus Tradelink IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is AA Plus Tradelink IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The AA Plus Tradelink IPO listing date is on Thursday, July 22, 2021.
